properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 3:47PM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation of snow, sleet and freezing rain.
Additional snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice
accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. The ice
accumulations will be mainly above 1000 feet in elevation.

* WHERE...Southern Berkshire County.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST FRIDAY
